caption_text:
I used to DJ drunk in clubs.

Now I open wellness raves where people drop into their bodies and lose their minds sober.

Life will always circle back on the things that bring you joy, sometimes in the least expected ways.

Thank you @awaken.events for having me back last night, @ecstaticdancekw for consistently delivering, and the K-W dance community for always showing up and making the scene what it is.

Set’s on my SoundCloud if you want to listen/relive it. I did this rare thing where I actually remembered to hit record 🤭

Link in bio. See you on the floor again soon 💚​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​
